Package business.manager.adventure

Interface AdventureFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdventureManager
public interface AdventureFacade
Interface that provides methods for managing adventures.

  • Method Details

    • useCloudPersistence

      void useCloudPersistence() throws PersistenceException
      Uses cloud persistence for data storage.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • useLocalPersistence

      void useLocalPersistence() throws PersistenceException
      Uses local persistence for data storage.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • checkValidAdventureName

      void checkValidAdventureName(String adventureName) throws PersistenceException, AdventureNameAlreadyExistsException
      Checks if the adventure name is valid and if it already exists.
      Parameters:
      adventureName - The name of the adventure to check.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.
      AdventureNameAlreadyExistsException - if the adventure name already exists.

    • createAdventure

      void createAdventure(String adventureName, int numberEncounters, List<Map<Monster,Integer>> encounters) throws PersistenceException
      Creates a new adventure with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      adventureName - The name of the adventure.
      numberEncounters - The number of encounters in the adventure.
      encounters - The list of encounters, each containing a map of monsters and their quantities.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • checkBossAmount

      void checkBossAmount(Map<Monster,Integer> monstersMap, Monster monster) throws BossAmountExceededException
      Checks if the boss amount in the given monsters map exceeds the maximum allowed amount for the given boss monster.
      Parameters:
      monstersMap - The map of monsters and their quantities.
      monster - The boss monster to check.
      Throws:
      BossAmountExceededException - if the boss amount exceeds the maximum allowed.

    • checkBossAmountToAdd

      void checkBossAmountToAdd(Monster monster, int numMonster) throws BossesToAddExceededException
      Checks if the number of bosses to add of the given monster exceeds the maximum allowed.
      Parameters:
      monster - The monster to add.
      numMonster - The number of monsters to add.
      Throws:
      BossesToAddExceededException - if the number of monsters to add exceeds the maximum allowed.

    • checkMonstersInEncounter

      void checkMonstersInEncounter(Map<Monster,Integer> monsters) throws EmptyEncounterException
      Checks if the encounter contains any monsters.
      Parameters:
      monsters - The map of monsters and their quantities.
      Throws:
      EmptyEncounterException - if the encounter is empty.

    • removeMonstersFromEncounter

      void removeMonstersFromEncounter(Monster monsterToRemove, Map<Monster,Integer> monsters)
      Removes the specified monster from the encounter.
      Parameters:
      monsterToRemove - The monster to remove from the encounter.
      monsters - The map of monsters and their quantities.

    • minimumCharactersRequired

      boolean minimumCharactersRequired(int characterAmount) throws PersistenceException, InsufficientCharactersAmountException
      Checks if the number of characters is equal to or greater than the minimum required amount.
      Parameters:
      characterAmount - The number of characters.
      Returns:
      true if the number of characters meets the minimum requirement, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.
      InsufficientCharactersAmountException - if the number of characters is insufficient.

    • getAvailableAdventuresNames

      List<String> getAvailableAdventuresNames() throws PersistenceException
      Gets the names of available adventures.
      Returns:
      The list of available adventure names.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • checkAdventureToPlay

      void checkAdventureToPlay(int adventureToPlay) throws PersistenceException, InvalidAdventureOptionException
      Checks if the adventure option to play is valid.
      Parameters:
      adventureToPlay - The adventure option to play.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.
      InvalidAdventureOptionException - if the adventure option is invalid.

    • getAdventureName

      String getAdventureName(int index) throws PersistenceException
      Gets the name of the adventure at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the adventure.
      Returns:
      The name of the adventure.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • checkNumberOfCharacters

      void checkNumberOfCharacters(int numCharacters, int max_characters) throws InvalidCharactersAmountForAdventureException
      Checks if the number of characters is valid for the adventure.
      Parameters:
      numCharacters - The number of characters.
      max_characters - The maximum number of characters allowed for the adventure.
      Throws:
      InvalidCharactersAmountForAdventureException - if the number of characters is invalid for the adventure.

    • checkCharacterToAdd

      void checkCharacterToAdd(List<Integer> indexCharacters, int characterToAdd, int availableCharacters) throws CharacterAlreadyInThePartyException, InvalidCharacterToAddOptionException
      Checks if the character to add is valid and not already in the party.
      Parameters:
      indexCharacters - The list of indexes of characters in the party.
      characterToAdd - The index of the character to add.
      availableCharacters - The number of available characters.
      Throws:
      CharacterAlreadyInThePartyException - if the character is already in the party.
      InvalidCharacterToAddOptionException - if the character to add is invalid.

    • setUpAdventure

      Adventure setUpAdventure(int adventureToPlay, List<Character> characters) throws PersistenceException
      Sets up the adventure to play with the specified characters.
      Parameters:
      adventureToPlay - The adventure option to play.
      characters - The list of characters for the adventure.
      Returns:
      The created Adventure object.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • doPreparationAction

      List<String> doPreparationAction(List<Character> party, Map<Character,Map<String,Integer>> partyStatsIncreased)
      Performs the preparation action for the party.
      Parameters:
      party - The list of characters in the party.
      partyStatsIncreased - The map of characters and their increased stats.
      Returns:
      The list of strings representing the actions performed during the preparation.

    • rollInitiatives

      List<String> rollInitiatives(List<Character> party, Map<Monster,Integer> encounterMonsters, List<Character> characterInitiatives, List<Monster> monsterInitiatives)
      Rolls initiatives for the characters and monsters in the encounter.
      Parameters:
      party - The list of characters in the party.
      encounterMonsters - The map of monsters in the encounter and their quantities.
      characterInitiatives - The list of characters' initiative values.
      monsterInitiatives - The list of monsters' initiative values.
      Returns:
      The list of strings representing the rolled initiatives.

    • doBattleActions

      List<String> doBattleActions(List<Character> party, List<Monster> monsters, int[] experience)
      Performs the battle actions for the party and monsters.
      Parameters:
      party - The list of characters in the party.
      monsters - The list of monsters in the encounter.
      experience - The array to store the gained experience points for each character.
      Returns:
      The list of strings representing the battle actions.

    • isTotalPartyUnconscious

      boolean isTotalPartyUnconscious(List<Character> party)
      Checks if the entire party is unconscious.
      Parameters:
      party - The list of characters in the party.
      Returns:
      true if the entire party is unconscious, false otherwise.

    • returnToDefaultStats

      void returnToDefaultStats(List<Character> party, Map<Character,Map<String,Integer>> partyStatIncreased)
      Returns the party's stats to their default values after a battle.
      Parameters:
      party - The list of characters in the party.
      partyStatIncreased - The map of characters and their increased stats.

    • doShortRestAction

      List<String> doShortRestAction(List<Character> party)
      Performs the short rest action for the party.
      Parameters:
      party - The list of characters in the party.
      Returns:
      The list of strings representing the actions performed during the short rest.

    • updateLevelAndEvolve

      List<String> updateLevelAndEvolve(List<Character> party, int experience)
      Updates the level and evolves the characters based on the gained experience.
      Parameters:
      party - The list of characters in the party.
      experience - The total experience gained.
      Returns:
      The list of strings representing the level and evolution updates.
